summary: This document appears to be a public notice or court filing from the U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell case, listing the charges against Maxwell for facilitating Jeffrey Epstein's sexual abuse of minors and identifying properties owned by Epstein where the alleged abuse occurred. It includes a call for potential victims to contact the FBI.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Charged with facilitating the sexual abuse of underaged girls by Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual for whom Maxwell allegedly facilitated the sexual abuse of underaged girls.

connections.description: Maxwell is charged with facilitating Epstein's sexual abuse of underaged girls.

events.title: Charging of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell has been charged with facilitating the sexual abuse of underaged girls by Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell has been criminally charged with facilitating Jeffrey Epstein's sexual abuse of underaged girls.
The alleged criminal conduct occurred in multiple locations: New York City, Palm Beach (Florida), Santa Fe (New Mexico), and London (England).
Properties owned by Jeffrey Epstein in New York, Palm Beach, and Santa Fe are identified as locations where the alleged grooming and/or abuse of minor victims occurred.
The document includes a public call for potential victims to contact the FBI at 1-800-CALL-FBI.
